about_the_game:
Step into the virtual world of Graffiti Bombing and become a graffiti writer. Whether you’re a new artist, seasoned veteran, or all-city hero, experience the thrill of graffiti in the (relatively) crime-free safety of Virtual Reality (VR).

Pack your supplies, grab your piece book, plan your outlines, color schemes, and paint types—then get ready to go all city!

Tag new spots, throw up quick pieces, create detailed characters, or take it further by painting massive burners and murals that span entire walls and buildings.

  • Immerse yourself in a seamless, richly detailed world packed with realistic time-of-day cycles, weather effects, animals, and spatial soundscapes.

  • Start from your Player Home—practice painting, plan your raids, and gear up for bombing missions.

  • Explore diverse Open World zones, uncover new locations, and find fresh spots to leave your mark.

  • Paint on walls, tunnels, trains, containers, and massive, sprawling walls—perfect for mega burners and murals.

  • Designed with future expansions in mind, the game’s world and mechanics are built to grow alongside new features.

  • Graffiti Bombing is a living, breathing world—what you paint stays until you come back. Want to bomb the same spot? Go over it!

  • Designed by a graffiti artist and modeled from real-world experience, the system looks and feels authentic.

  • Spray on walls and surfaces using different paint types:

    • FT-ACTION 71 (Regular/Multi-purpose)

    • Slick Rick! (Gloss) – exclusive to All City Edition DLC.

    • Rack-a-lak (Matte) – exclusive to All City Edition DLC.

    • Zero2Hero (Metallic) – exclusive to All City Edition DLC.

  • Buff mistakes or clean surfaces with Spit Extreme Clean spray.

  • Paint Zones load and save automatically as you create, so your work is always preserved.

  • Use the Actions Assistant to locate nearby zones and discover new bombing spots.

  • Customize spray styles with different cap types, including All City, NY Fat, Filler, Skinny, Pink Fat, and more coming soon.

  • Fine-tune your work with spray pressure and line dynamics settings.

  • Dynamic Spray Control—trigger pressure, movement speed, distance from surfaces, and other factors affect line thickness, falloff, and paint accumulation.

  • Dual Wielding—cover large areas quickly with spray cans in both hands!

  • Additional Tools—use realistic paint tools like rollers and marker pens for different styles and effects.

  • Object Mask Mode—when enabled, combine spray can output with objects like planks of wood to create straight lines and masking effects.

  • An intelligent drip system detects paint build-up and generates realistic drips.

  • Discover new ways to interact with the world around you—pick up objects, open doors, operate lifts, and even move vehicles.

  • Stock up at the Bombastic - Graffiti Supplies vending machine to refill your paint and tools.

  • Use your backpack inventory to store paint tools, clipboards, and more.

  • Reach tricky graffiti spots by climbing, stacking pallets, or using ladders, scissor lifts, and platforms. Get creative to hit those hard-to-reach areas!

  • Play custom tracks on the jukebox in your Player Home or blast tunes on a retro Boombox while out bombing.

  • Use the Clipboard to display imported outline images as references for creating graffiti pieces in-game.

  • Interactive Torch (exclusive to All City Edition DLC) features three modes:

    • Torch Mode – Standard light for dark areas.

    • Resize Mode – Shrink or unshrink climbable objects to use and stash in your backpack.

    • Projector Mode – Project imported graffiti outlines onto surfaces as painting guides.

  • All City Edition DLC players can access secure areas using keycards and codes.

  • Natural Interactions – User interfaces are designed to feel fun, intuitive, and immersive.

  • TV Main Menu – Control game modes and settings from the TV in your Player Home using a remote. Adjust paint system options, locomotion, graphics, quality, and more.

  • Actions Assistant – A tablet-like device for managing graffiti tools, spray cap dynamics, outlines, camera settings, saves, and more.

  • Graffiti Manager – Easily mix and select color palettes, and create Quick Color Swatches using drag-and-drop.

  • Radial Menu & Quick Actions – Access key tools and settings quickly, including:

    • Lock Position

    • Color Palette

    • Quick Color Swatches

    • Spray Caps Selector

    • Color Dropper

    • Spray Settings

    • Object Masking

    • And more.

  • Capture Photos – Use the Actions Assistant's built-in camera to snap shots of your graffiti.

  • Manage Your Gallery – Preview and organize your photos via the camera roll and gallery.

  • Hall of Fame Submissions – Submit your best pieces to the official Graffiti Bombing website for a chance to be featured in the renowned Hall of Fame.

  • Video Recording (All City Edition DLC) – Access a handheld video camera that records directly to MP4 format, perfect for capturing your creative process.

Note:
The Free-To-Play version of Graffiti Bombing includes a limited feature set. Many advanced features, tools, and content outlined above are exclusive to the All City Edition DLC.

Additional planned features and updates for 2025 will be detailed in the development roadmap once the current base game build is stable and bug-free.

name: Graffiti Bombing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10, 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD RX 590 (8GB+) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c) or better
  • VR Support: SteamVR. HTC VIVE, Valve Index, Oculus / Meta headsets, or Pico 4.
  • Additional Notes: Graffiti Bombing is technically demanding. If you're running minimum specs, expect to lower in-game resolution and settings to maintain a high frame rate. An SSD is required for optimal performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10, 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700K / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3070 / RX 6700 XT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c) or better
  • VR Support: SteamVR. HTC VIVE, Valve Index, Oculus / Meta headsets, or Pico 4.
  • Additional Notes: For ultra settings or higher resolutions, an RTX 3080 / RX 6800 XT or equivalent is recommended. An SSD is required for optimal performance.
